name: Submonoid.coe_pos
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝⁴ : MulZeroOneClass α
inst✝³ : PartialOrder α
inst✝² : PosMulStrictMono α
inst✝¹ : ZeroLEOneClass α
inst✝ : NeZero 1
⊢ Eq (↑(Submonoid.pos α)) (Set.Ioi 0)
decl:
/-- The submonoid of positive elements. -/
@[simps] def pos : Submonoid α where
  carrier := Set.Ioi 0
  one_mem' := zero_lt_one
  mul_mem' := mul_pos

name: Submonoid.mem_pos
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝⁴ : MulZeroOneClass α
inst✝³ : PartialOrder α
inst✝² : PosMulStrictMono α
inst✝¹ : ZeroLEOneClass α
inst✝ : NeZero 1
a : α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Submonoid.pos α) a) (LT.lt 0 a)
decl: @[simp] lemma mem_pos : a ∈ pos α ↔ 0 < a := Iff.rfl
